title: Rewriting the Number
text: When we separate the number 17,864,325,619,004 by its commas, it can be rewritten as 17,000,000,000+864,000,000,000+325,000,000,000+619,000+4.

title: Rewriting the Number
text: This is the same thing as $$17$$ $$trillion+864$$ $$billion+325$$ $$million+619$$ $$thousand+4$$.
